channel.title: ::yell help
channel.description:
can anyone make me a working ::yell system so like
it does this:
[OWNER] I Test I: Yell'd Message [Admin] I Test I: Yell'd Message [Moderator] I Test I: Yell'd Message [DONATOR] I Test I: Yell'd Message
well the main idea if this is donator + with the tags how would i do that.
note: my current delta based source doesn't have ::yell

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:15, topic:272985”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=360315.msg2988977#msg2988977 date=1255192842]

yes it is to make it donater-mod-admin-owner but nvm i already fixed by my self

cough You’re welcome. cough
[/quote]Epic you don’t need to answer every single question… other know the answer aswell.[/quote]
Just because I don’t need to answer every question with helpful things, doesn’t mean I can’t.
Stop being an arrogant kid.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

WOW.

String[] rights = {"[Player]", "[Mod]","[Admin]"}; if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); msg = args[1]; for(int i=0; i<rights.length; i++) { rights = rights[i]; yell(rights+" "+playerName+": "+msg); } }

shortened + better than yours.

ps: i know you won’t read this but i miss you Evan.

Read full topic

command.substring(5).trim();[/quote]

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

if (playerRights == 0) {
yell("[Player] " +command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights == 1) {
yell("[Mod] " +command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights == 2) {
yell("[Admin] " +command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights == 3) {
yell("[Owner] " +command.substring(5));
}
}[/code]

Change at will.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Replace that with that if statement with one that checks if the player is a donor using the donor variable for your server.

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:272985”][code]
if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String msg = command.substring(5);
String tag = “”;
switch(playerRights) {
case 1:
tag = “[Moderator]”;
break;

    case 2:
        tag = "[Admin]";
    break;

    case 3:
        tag = "[OWNER]";
    break;
}
if(isDonor)
    tag += "[DONOR]"; // because wtf is a "donator"
yell(tag + " " + playerName + ": "+msg);

}
[/code][/quote]
client.java:8113: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isDonor
location: class client
if(isDonor)
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell")) {
    String msg = command.substring(5);
    String tag = "";
    switch(playerRights) {
        case 1:
            tag = "[Moderator]";
        break;

        case 2:
            tag = "[Admin]";
        break;

        case 3:
            tag = "[OWNER]";
        break;
    }
    if(isDonor)
        tag += "[DONOR]"; // because wtf is a "donator"
    yell(tag + " " + playerName + ": "+msg);
}

Read full topic
